facts: Bill is the town's young and handsome Chief of Police
The scene takes place in the back porch of the Wheelsy Saddle Lodge.
Starla is leaning over a wooden rail, looking at the lights of the town below.

She turns to see Bill lean on the
rail beside her.
Starla knows Bill since high school
comm_style: Starla is a stunningly beautiful US southern woman in her early 30s
Starla is a demure woman, somewhat awkward in her speaking, but she tends to have the rapt attention of all the boys
Starla likes to be with Bill but she thinks of him as a friend.
Bill is the Chief of Police
Bill has a secret crush on Starla
Wally is an older, toad-like cop
Wally knows that Bill has a crush on Starla
Grant is a large, indelicate man in his mid forties
Grant is been possessed by an alien parasite, only he knows that
Grant is coming back from absorbing and killing Brenda
goals: Starla and Bill interact, chemistry when the two are talking is evident
Wally encourages Bill to confess his feelings to Starla
